title: Where is my 1st win reward?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body:
Oh snap you sure know how to bait a poro with that promise of snax eh? 

AFAIK, the mission needs to be *active* before starting a game for it to count. I'd try to help out if I could, but since this post was so long ago you've likely already gotten the FWotD by this point =(. 

.....do I at least still get a cookie o_O?
